text:
*REFLEXION*

I have an existing website client that will be migrated to HubSpot CMS
I need to create two seperate parts
- Public part on <http://www.website.com|www.website.com>
- Private part on <http://parters.website.com|parters.website.com>

*First issue = Membership system work only with connected domain*
So how can I create a new website with membership section without connect domains because the website is still live ?

*Second issue*
When working with two subdomains (www and parts) itâ€™s not possible to affect this domain to website without connecting domains ... We have just <http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com> option...
This problem is linked to the previous one. I need to work on HubSpot CMS without connecting domain

*Third issue*
How can I customize login and logout template ?

Thanks for your help and feedbacks everybody !
<@U25C65C3S> this is a good question for you.
Hey <@U3TR96G84> would you mind DM'ing me a loom video of what you're seeing step by step?  I just ran through a few scenarios in my portal and couldn't reproduce this with the information I have.
